projects.name: Crimsonland
projects.description: Crimson land is a e-commerce website where you can 'buy' goodies from Konosuba, it's a school project.

projects.name: Webdoc : Electricity
projects.description: This project was a webdoc who talk about electricity, we have made it in a paternship with the CUEJ of Strasbourg, we where in a group of 5 people and use agile method to work, it's a school project.

projects.name: Water informations
projects.description: Was a school project for learn more about ChartJs and Tailwind, we have to show some informations about water in the world.

projects.name: Nomad Explorer
projects.description: Nomad Explorer was a project about traveling around the world and share some tips, we have to use GoogleMap API to show a map with some markers and a list of different places, it's a school project.

projects.name: Hair App
projects.description: Was a personal project to learn more about react and nextjs who show you a list of different haidress in France who have a pun with their name.
